metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29599 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: ImageMagick before 6.9.11-40 and 7.x before 7.0.10-40 mishandles the-authenticate option, which allows setting a password forpassword-protected PDF files. The user-controlled password was not properlyescaped/sanitized and it was therefore possible to inject additional shellcommands via coders/pdf.c.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
